alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 14 at 2:04AM MDT until October 14 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MDT /10 AM CDT/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures around 26 degrees expected. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma, Kit Carson and Cheyenne Counties. In Kansas, Cheyenne, Sherman, Wallace and Greeley Counties. * WHEN...From midnight MDT /1 AM CDT/ tonight to 9 AM MDT /10 AM CDT/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
